modals.under_12_headline: Your family member is under 12 years of age.
modals.under_12_copy: Our products are intended for use in children 12 and over.  Please consult your child's physician for appropriate care.  We hope your child gets back to health soon.
modals.session_expired_copy: To protect your privacy, we have ended your session.  Please feel free to restart your assessment.
modals.general_problem_headline: There's a problem, please try again.
modals.general_problem_copy: Sorry, we've run into a problem. Feel free to try your assessment again.
